ItemDataTable< VALUE_TYPE, VALUE_SAVER > Class Template Reference

A class that can store values for items in a compact way using a default value to remove storage for a common value. More...

#include <ItemDataTable.h>

Detailed Description

template<class VALUE_TYPE, class VALUE_SAVER = typename LoaderTypeSelector<VALUE_TYPE>::loaderType>
class ItemDataTable< VALUE_TYPE, VALUE_SAVER >

A class that can store values for items in a compact way using a default value to remove storage for a common value.

FIXME: Template the option to store the items in zoom levels.

template<class VALUE_TYPE, class VALUE_SAVER = typename LoaderTypeSelector<VALUE_TYPE>::loaderType>
ItemDataTable< VALUE_TYPE, VALUE_SAVER >::ItemDataTable (  const VALUE_TYPE &  defaultVal,
const itemMap_t &  itemsToAdd
)  [inline]
 

Creates a new table with the supplied default value.

Parameters:
defaultVal The value to return if an item isn't found in the table. Items with exactly this type will not be added to the table.
itemsToAdd The items to add.
